item.title: Raise Fund for Save Elephant
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
In today's world due to deforestation wild animals are going to vanish for good. Elephants are one of them. They are also going to vanish from the world. so we want to save those animals who are going to vanish. Not only elephants, we also want to save other animals such as monkeys, tigers, deer and bears to maintain the ecology of the environment. So please donate to us to save the world and wild animals.

Raise Fund for Healthy Food

item.title: Education for Poor Children
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
To make sure education for poor children we are raising our funds. At present we are seeing millions of children being neglected around the world. They do not get proper education, food, treatment and many other advantages due to poverty. We are raising our fund to help these poor children around the globe. Your small donation can help us to raise our fund and can make sure of their education, treatment and other things. So please donate to help the poor.  

Raise Fund for Healthy Food

item.title: Promoting The Rights of Children
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Around the world, many children are neglected due to their poverty. They can eat food properly, and can not go to school. So parents send those children to work for a small amount of money. As a result, they are not getting their right. It is shameful for us. So to make sure the rights of poor children who are neglected we are working on this event. Called promoting the rights of poor children.  

Raise Fund for Healthy Food

item.title: Site footer one
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Love us a trusted name for helping the poor who are neglected and affected. Love us started their journey in 2010. Our slogan is Save the poor and make the world happy.

  • Sponsor
  • Fundraise

  • Partner

item.content:encoded:
Need Your Help

Your donation can save millions of poor people around the world and make the world a better place.

Donate Now

Help The Poor To build a better World

Your donation can help to educate thousands of poor people and make the world more beautiful.

Donate Now

Need Your Help

Your donation can save millions of poor people around the world and make the world a better place.

Donate Now

Pure Water

Millions of people around the world live under a lower scale of poverty. They do not get pure, safe and sound drinking water. So we are trying to serve them pure health water for their better future.

Healthy Food

In today's world we know that many people do not get their food daily. It is very difficult for us in today's world that people do not get their food. So we opened a project called "No people will die without eating"

Medical Facilities

People in Africa, Philistine, afghanistan, Livia and many other countries are not getting the proper medical treatment. So we have open a slogan and a project called people will not suffer for medical treatment

Watch Video

Watch Our Latest Activities

We are working on many projects right now such as saving the elephants, making sure of the education for poor children, promoting the rights of poor children and so many other projects.

Donate Now
Our Causes

Popular Causes

Please Donate For Help

Education for Poor Children

It is important because your small support can change the world a lot. 62% Raised: $5,000.00 Goal: $8,000.00 Read More

Raise Fund for Save Elephant

Your donation can save the elephants around the world. 62% Raised: $5,000.00 Goal: $8,000.00 Read More

Promoting The Rights of Children

We have launched this project to ensure the rights of poor children. 62% Raised: $5,000.00 Goal: $8,000.00 Read More
0 Project Complate 0 Satisfied Clients 0 Experienced Staff 0 Awards Win
Proident Sunt

Our Mission

Our mission is to make the world a better place for everyone. Everyone has their rights equally and we want to make sure that people can get food, education, treatment and accommodation for everyone who is living in poverty.

Read More

People Talk

LoveUs has provided their NGO and Non Profit service approximately 25 years and I see that they provide their service with more trust and honesty. Ohoko Haba Compared to the other NGO in the world I have seen that the service LoveUS provides is safe and their service much better than the other care NGOin the world. Hattie Bradly They are giving their NGO service 24/7. Once I informed them that A man was in trouble. They helped that man within 1 hr and solved that problem and I was impressed. Tomas Pros LoveUs has provided their NGO and Non Profit service approximately 25 years and I see that they provide their service with more trust and honesty. Linisus conda

Your donation will help us save and improve lives with research, education and emergency care.

I Feel Like I'm Nothing Without Wildlife.

Wild animals are more important to save the ecology of the environment so dont destroy the forests.

Donate Now

You Can Help
The Poor

Your donation can save millions of poor people around the world and make the world a better place

Donate Now

I feel like I am nothin
g without wildlife

Wild animals are more important to save the ecology of the environment so dont destroy the forests.

Donate Now

About Us

Donate Clean Water

We all know that another name of water is life.Many people around the world do not get clean water to drink. So please donate clean water to help the poor. People will get free from many diseases caused by the water.

Read More
Our Causes

Popular Causes

Please Donate For Help

62% Raised: $5,000.00 Goal: $8,000.00

Raise Fund for Save Elephant

Safe Zone for Royal Bengal Tiger

Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident sunt. Read More
What We Do?

We Are Worldwide Non-Profit & NGO Ogranization

Please Donate For Help

Pure Water

Want to make sure the water is pure for all wild animals.

Food for animals

We want to make a team to give food to those animals.

Medical facilities

Want to give medical treatment for those animals who are sick.

Pure Water

Want to make sure the water is pure for all wild animals

Meet Our Team

Our Volunteer

This is our volunteer team. If you want you can join us as a volunteer.

Catherine Jones

Engineer

Lauren Davis

Photographer

Susan hardson

Reporter

Dabid slapc

Engineer
Our Process

How Do You Help?

Please Donate For Help

Send Donation

You can send the donation to us for helping the poor.If you dont want to give us then help the poor directly.

Donate Now

Get Involved

Money is not always the way to help the poor. You can get involved by giving them anything that you are capable of.

Donate Now

Send Gift

You can send them a gift for an individual or multiple person/family that you want to give them to make them happy.

Donate Now
Testimonials

People Talk

LoveUs has provided their NGO and Non Profit service approximately 25 years and I see that they provide their service with more trust and honesty. Compared to the other NGO in the world I have seen that the service LoveUS provides is safe and their service much better than the other care NGOin the world. They are giving their NGO service 24/7. Once I informed them that A man was in trouble. They helped that man within 1 hr and solved that problem and I was impressed. LoveUs has provided their NGO and Non Profit service approximately 25 years and I see that they provide their service with more trust and honesty. They are giving their NGO service 24/7. Once I informed them that A man was in trouble. They helped that man within 1 hr and solved that problem and I was impressed.

You Can Help
The Poor

Your donation can save millions of poor people around the world and make the world a better place.

Donate Now

Help The Poor To build
A better World

Your donation can help to educate thousands of poor people and make the world more beautiful

Donate Now

You Can Help
The Poor

Your donation can save millions of poor people around the world and make the world a better place.

Donate Now
About Us

You Can Help The Poor

Love us A trusted name for helping the poor. We have been working on this project since 2000 to make the world equal for everyone. At present we are working on a project called "Save The Children and Make The World a Better Place

Read More

Become Volunteer

Quick Fundraise

Give Donation

Become Volunteer

Our Causes

Popular Causes

Please Donate For Help

62% Raised: $5,000.00 Goal: $8,000.00

Promoting The Rights of Children

Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident sunt. Read More 62% Raised: $5,000.00 Goal: $8,000.00

Raise Fund for Save Elephant

Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident sunt. Read More 62% Raised: $5,000.00 Goal: $8,000.00

Education for Poor Children

Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident sunt. Read More
Watch Video

Watch Our Latest Activities

We are working on many projects right now such as saving the elephants, making sure of the education for poor children, promoting the rights of poor children and so many other projects.

Donate Now
What We Do?

Were On A Mission To Solve
The Problems

Please Donate For Help

Pure Water

Millions of people around the world live under a lower scale of poverty. They do not get pure, safe and sound drinking water. So we are trying to serve them pure health water for their better future.

Healthy Food

In today's world we know that many people do not get their food daily. It is very difficult for us in today's world that people do not get their food. So we opened a project called "No people will die without eating"

Medical Facilities

People in Africa, Philistine, afghanistan, Livia and many other countries are not getting the proper medical treatment. So we have open a slogan and a project called people will not suffer for medical treatment

Education

Education is the backbone of a nation. But many children do not get a chance to go to school due to their poverty. So we are raising funds for a project called education for everyone and every child will go to school.

Proident Sunt

Our Mission

Our mission is to make the world a better place for everyone. Everyone has their rights equally and we want to make sure that people can get food, education, treatment and accommodation for everyone who is living in poverty.

Read More Proident Sunt

Our Vision

In 2030 we want to see our organization in that position where we can see that only 10 percent people are living under poverty and in 2040 no people will be living under poverty around the world.

Read More

How Can You Help?

Your donation will help us save and improve lives with research, education and emergency care.

Donate Now Join Us Now
Meet Our Team

Our Volunteer

Please Donate For Help

item.content:encoded:
I Feel Like I'm Nothing
Without Wildlife.

Wild animals are more important to save the ecology of the environment so dont destroy the forests.

Donate Now

You Can Help
The Poor

Your donation can save millions of poor people around the world and make the world a better place

Donate Now

I feel like I am nothing
without wildlife

Wild animals are more important to save the ecology of the environment so dont destroy the forests.

Donate Now

Pure Water

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet constur adipisicing elit sed. Read More

Pure Water

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet constur adipisicing elit sed. Read More

Medical Facilities

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet constur adipisicing elit sed. Read More About Us

We Protect Wildlife

Wildlife is the most important for our ecology system. If ecosystems break then our environment will be affected by that. So we want to protect wildlife.

Read More
Our Causes

Popular Causes

Please Donate for Help

62% Raised: $5,000.00 Goal: $8,000.00

Raise Fund for Save Elephant

Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident sunt. Read More 62% Raised: $5,000.00 Goal: $8,000.00

Education for Poor Children

Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident sunt. Read More 62% Raised: $5,000.00 Goal: $8,000.00

Promoting The Rights of Children

Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident sunt. Read More
What We Do?

We Are Worldwide Non-Profit & NGO Ogranization

Please Donate for Help

Pure Water

Millions of people around the world live under a lower scale of poverty. They do not get pure, safe and sound drinking water. So we are trying to serve them pure health water for their better future.

Healthy Food

In today's world we know that many people do not get their food daily. It is very difficult for us in today's world that people do not get their food. So we opened a project called "No people will die without eating"

Medical Facilities

People in Africa, Philistine, afghanistan, Livia and many other countries are not getting the proper medical treatment. So we have open a slogan and a project called people will not suffer for medical treatment

Education

Education is the backbone of a nation. But many children do not get a chance to go to school due to their poverty. So we are raising funds for a project called education for everyone and every child will go to school.

Our Process

How Do You Help?

Please Donate for Help

Send Donation

You can send the donation to us for helping the poor. If you dont want to give us then help the poor directly.

Donate Now

Get Involved

Money is not always the way to help the poor. You can get involved by giving them anything that you are capable of.

Donate Now

Make A Gift

You can send them a gift for an individual or multiple person/family that you want to give them to make them happy.

Donate Now
Meet Our Team

Our Volunteer

This is our volunteer. If you want you can join us as a volunteer.

Catherine Jones

Engineer

Lauren Davis

Photographer

Susan hardson

Reporter

Hunder Sopas

Reporter

How Can You Help?

Your donation will help us save and improve lives with research, education and emergency care.

Donate Now Join Us Now
Upcoming Events

Our Events

Please Donate For Help

Donation is Hope for affected

  • Newyork City
Read More

item.title: Blog
item.dc:creator: admin

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
About Us

Please Rise Your Helping Hand

Love us A trusted name for helping the poor. We have been working on this project since 2000 to make the world equal for everyone. At present we are working on a project called "Save The Children and Make The World a Better Place".

Read More

Our Mission

Our mission is to make the world a better place for everyone. Everyone has their rights equally and we want to make sure that people can get food, education, treatment and accommodation for everyone who is living in poverty.

Our Vision

In 2030 we want to see our organization in that position where we can see that only 10 percent people are living under poverty and in 2040 no people will be living under poverty around the world.

Our Values

Only poor people and the people who are working with us will know the value of us. We do not believe in talk we believe in work. So help the poor make the world valuable for all. Make world a good place for them.

0 Project Complate 0 Satisfied Clients 0 Experienced Staff 0 Awards Win
Our Causes

Popular Causes

Please Donate For Help

62% Raised: $5,000.00 Goal: $8,000.00

Raise Fund for Save Elephant

Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident sunt. Read More 62% Raised: $5,000.00 Goal: $8,000.00

Education for Poor Children

Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident sunt. Read More 62% Raised: $5,000.00 Goal: $8,000.00

Promoting The Rights of Children

Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident sunt. Read More
What We Do?

Were On A Mission To Solve
The Problems

Cupidatat non proident sunt

Pure Water

Millions of people around the world live under a lower scale of poverty. They do not get pure, safe and sound drinking water. So we are trying to serve them pure health water for their better future.

Healthy Food

In today's world we know that many people do not get their food daily. It is very difficult for us in today's world that people do not get their food. So we opened a project called "No people will die without eating"

Medical Facilities

People in Africa, Philistine, afghanistan, Livia and many other countries are not getting the proper medical treatment. So we have open a slogan and a project called people will not suffer for medical treatment

Education

Education is the backbone of a nation. But many children do not get a chance to go to school due to their poverty. So we are raising funds for a project called education for everyone and every child will go to school.

Meet Our Team

Our Volunteer

Please Donate For Help

Catherine Jones

Engineer

Lauren Davis

Photographer

Susan hardson

Reporter

item.title: Raise Fund for Food
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
In today's world we know that many people do not get their food daily. It is very difficult for us in today's world that people do not get their food. So we opened a project called "No people will die without eating"

  1.  Food essential for good health and nutrition.
  2. It protects you against many chronic noncommunicable diseases.
  3. Healthy food give us better mood and energy levels
  4. Improved memory and brain health

Millions of people around the world live under a lower scale of poverty. They do not get pure, safe and sound drinking water. So we are trying to serve them pure health water for their better future.

Promoting the right of poor children

We have launched this project to ensure the rights of poor children.Around the world many children are neglected due to their poverty. They can eat food properly, and can not go to school. So parents  send those children to work for a small amount of money. As a result they are not getting their right. It is shameful for us. So to make sure the rights of poor children who are neglected we are working on this event. Called promoting the rights of poor children.

People in Africa, Philistine, afghanistan, Livia and many other countries are not getting the proper medical treatment. So we have open a slogan and a project called people will not suffer for medical treatment

item.content:encoded:
Need Your Help

Your donation can save millions of poor people around the world and make the world a better place

Donate Now

Help To Educate Children

Your donation can help to educate thousands of poor people and make the world more beautiful.

Donate Now

You can help the poor

Your donation can save millions of poor people around the world and make the world a better place

Donate Now
Watch Video

Watch Our Latest Activities

We are working on many projects right now such as saving the elephants, making sure of the education for poor children, promoting the rights of poor children and so many other projects.

Donate Now
Our Causes

Popular Causes

Please Donate For Help

Raise Fund for Save Elephant

Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident sunt. 62% Raised: $5,000.00 Goal: $8,000.00 Read More

Education for Poor Children

Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident sunt. 62% Raised: $5,000.00 Goal: $8,000.00 Read More

Promoting The Rights of Birds

Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident sunt. 62% Raised: $5,000.00 Goal: $8,000.00 Read More
Proident Sunt

Our Mission

Our mission is to make the world a better place for everyone. Everyone has their rights equally and we want to make sure that people can get food, education, treatment and accommodation for everyone who is living in poverty.

Read More Proident Sunt

Our Vision

In 2030 we want to see our organization in that position where we can see that only 10 percent people are living under poverty and in 2040 no people will be living under poverty around the world.

Read More

How Can You Help?

Your donation will help us save and improve lives with research, education and emergency care.

Donate Now Join Us Now
Upcoming Events

Our Events

item.title: Home 5
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
We Can Change World

Many a penny makes a pond; drops of water make the ocean. So if we work together we can change the world in a better way.

Donate Now

Plant Tree Save Earth

Due to the destruction of forests, our environment temperature will increase day by day. So plant trees to save human life.

Donate Now

Save The Amazon

Trees give us oxygen. If amazon hampers then it has a huge impact on our environment. So all together we can save the amazon.

Donate Now
About Us

Our Mission Is Save Environment

Our mission is to make the world a better place for everyone. Everyone has their rights equally and we want to make sure that people can get food, education, treatment and accommodation for everyone who is living in poverty.

Read More
Our Causes

Popular Causes

Please Donate For Help

Raise Fund for Save Elephant

62% Raised: $5,000.00 Goal: $8,000.00 Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident sunt. Read More

Raise Fund for Save Elephant

62% Raised: $5,000.00 Goal: $8,000.00 Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident sunt. Read More

Promoting The Rights of Birds

62% Raised: $5,000.00 Goal: $8,000.00 Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident sunt. Read More

Promoting The Rights of Children

62% Raised: $5,000.00 Goal: $8,000.00 Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident sunt. Read More
What We Do?

You Can Help The Poor

Cupidatat non proident sunt

Pure Water

Healthy Food

Medical Facilities

Education

Homeless Children

Love Your World

Our Process

How Do You Help?

Please Donate For Help

Send Donation

You can send the donation to us for helping the poor. If you dont want to give us then help the poor directly.

Donate Now

Get Involved

Money is not always the way to help the poor. You can get involved by giving them anything that you are capable of.

Donate Now

Send Gift

You can send them a gift for an individual or multiple person/family that you want to give them to make them happy.

Donate Now

How Can You Help?

Your donation will help us save and improve lives with research, education and emergency care.

Donate Now Join Us Now
Get In Touch

item.title: Home 6
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Help The Poor To build a better World

Your donation can save millions of poor people around the world and make the world a better place.

Donate Now

We can change
the world

Many a penny makes a pond; drops of water make the ocean. So if we work together we can change the world in a better way.

Donate Now

You Can Help
The Poor

Your donation can save millions of poor people around the world and make the world a better place

Donate Now

Pure Water

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet constur adipisicing elit sed.

Read More

Pure Water

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet constur adipisicing elit sed.

Read More

Medical Facilities

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet constur adipisicing elit sed.

Read More
What We Do

Giving Child Education

Child education is more important for the future. If we fail to educate our children, the future will have a huge impact on this. Poverty will increase more.So we must educate the children for our better future.

Read More
0 Project Complate 0 Satisfied Clients 0 Experienced Staff 0 Awards Win
Our Causes

Popular Causes

Please Donate For Help

62% Raised: $5,000.00 Goal: $8,000.00

Raise Fund for Save Elephant

Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident sunt. Read More 62% Raised: $5,000.00 Goal: $8,000.00

Education for Poor Children

Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident sunt. Read More 62% Raised: $5,000.00 Goal: $8,000.00

Promoting The Rights of Children

Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident sunt. Read More
Our Process

How Do You Help?

Please Donate For Help

Send Donation

You can send the donation to us for helping the poor.If you dont want to give us then help the poor directly.

Donate Now

Get Involved

Money is not always the way to help the poor. You can get involved by giving them anything that you are capable of.

Donate Now

Make A Gift

You can send them a gift for an individual or multiple person/family that you want to give them to make them happy.

Donate Now
Upcoming Events

Our Events

Please Donate For Help

20 Sep

Donation is Hope for affected

  • 8:00 am - 5:00 pm
  • Newyork City
Read More 20 Sep

Make Donation Day for All People

  • 8:00 am - 5:00 pm
  • Newyork City
Read More 20 Sep

Donation for Early Childhood Rise

  • 8:00 am - 5:00 pm
  • Newyork City
Read More
Testimonial

What People Say

Please Donate For Help

LoveUs has provided their NGO and Non Profit service approximately 25 years and I see that they provide their service with more trust and honesty.

Enam Huris Developer

Compared to the other NGO in the world I have seen that the service LoveUS provides is safe and their service much better than the other care NGOin the world.

Neri Eusd Lead Developer

They are giving their NGO service 24/7. Once I informed them that A man was in trouble. They helped that man within 1 hr and solved that problem and I was impressed.

Ekura Sass Polar

Meet Our Team

Our Volunteer

Please Donate For Help

Catherine Jones

Engineer

Lauren Davis

Photographer

Susan hardson

item.title: Home page 7
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Need Your Help

Your donation can save millions of poor people around the world and make the world a better place.

Donate Now

Help The Poor To build a better World

Your donation can help to educate thousands of poor people and make the world more beautiful.

Donate Now

Need Your Help

Your donation can save millions of poor people around the world and make the world a better place.

Donate Now

Pure Water

Millions of people around the world live under a lower scale of poverty. They do not get pure, safe and sound drinking water. So we are trying to serve them pure health water for their better future.

Healthy Food

In today's world we know that many people do not get their food daily. It is very difficult for us in today's world that people do not get their food. So we opened a project called "No people will die without eating"

Medical Facilities

People in Africa, Philistine, afghanistan, Livia and many other countries are not getting the proper medical treatment. So we have open a slogan and a project called people will not suffer for medical treatment

Watch Video

Watch Our Latest Activities

We are working on many projects right now such as saving the elephants, making sure of the education for poor children, promoting the rights of poor children and so many other projects.

Donate Now
Our Causes

Popular Causes

Please Donate For Help

Education for Poor Children

Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident sunt. 62% Raised: $5,000.00 Goal: $8,000.00 Read More

Raise Fund for Save Elephant

Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident sunt. 62% Raised: $5,000.00 Goal: $8,000.00 Read More

Promoting The Rights of Children

Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident sunt. 62% Raised: $5,000.00 Goal: $8,000.00 Read More
0 Project Complate 0 Satisfied Clients 0 Experienced Staff 0 Awards Win
Proident Sunt

Our Mission

Our mission is to make the world a better place for everyone. Everyone has their rights equally and we want to make sure that people can get food, education, treatment and accommodation for everyone who is living in poverty.

Read More

People Talk

LoveUs has provided their NGO and Non Profit service approximately 25 years and I see that they provide their service with more trust and honesty. Ohoko Haba Compared to the other NGO in the world I have seen that the service LoveUS provides is safe and their service much better than the other care NGOin the world. Hattie Bradly They are giving their NGO service 24/7. Once I informed them that A man was in trouble. They helped that man within 1 hr and solved that problem and I was impressed. Tomas Pros LoveUs has provided their NGO and Non Profit service approximately 25 years and I see that they provide their service with more trust and honesty. Linisus conda
Upcoming Events

Our Events

Please Donate For Help

  • 8:00 - 5:00
  • Newyork City

  • 8:00 - 5:00
  • Newyork City

Your donation will help us save and improve lives with research, education and emergency care.

item.title: Home page 8
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Fundraising for
the people

Coronavirus gives us a huge loss in our daily life. Many people die because they can not work outside. So we are raising funds to help those people.

Donate Now

Coronavirus
Advice On Fundraising

After starting the coronavirus we LoveUs NGO started to raise funds. LoveUs already helped 1 lakh people in this pandemic and we want to help more so please donate to us.

Donate Now

Fundraising for
the people

Coronavirus gives us a huge loss in our daily life. Many people die because they can not work outside. So we are raising funds to help those people.

Donate Now
About Us

You Can Help The Poor

Love us A trusted name for helping the poor. We have been working on this project since 2000 to make the world equal for everyone. At present we are working on a project called "Save The Children and Make The World a Better Place".

Read More

Become Volunteer

Quick Fundraise

Give Donation

Become Volunteer

Our Process

How Do You Help?

Please Donate For Help

Send Donation

You can send the donation to us for helping the poor.If you dont want to give us then help the poor directly.

Donate Now

Get Involved

Money is not always the way to help the poor. You can get involved by giving them anything that you are capable of.

Donate Now

Send Gift

You can send them a gift for an individual or multiple person/family that you want to give them to make them happy.

Donate Now
Our Donros

Recent Donors

Please Donate For Help

Paul Wilson

Donation

$500

Temans Code

Donation

$50

item.title: Home page 9
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Fundraising for
coronavirus relief

Coronavirus gives us a huge loss in our daily life. Many people die because they can not work outside. So we are raising funds to help those people.

Donate Now

Coronavirus Advice
On Fundraising

After starting the coronavirus we LoveUs NGO started to raise funds. LoveUs already helped 1 lakh people in this pandemic and we want to help more so please donate to us.

Donate Now

Fundraising for
coronavirus relief

Coronavirus gives us a huge loss in our daily life. Many people die because they can not work outside. So we are raising funds to help those people.

Donate Now

After starting the coronavirus we LoveUs NGO started to raise funds. LoveUs already helped 1 lakh people in this pandemic and we want to help more so please donate to us.

Donate Now
About Us

Coronavirus Advice On Fundraising

After starting the coronavirus we LoveUs NGO started to raise funds. LoveUs already helped 1 lakh people in this pandemic and we want to help more so please donate to us.

Read More

Become Volunteer

Quick Fundraise

Give Donation

Become Volunteer

Help For Covid-19

Our Services

Please Donate For Help

Medical Treatment

People in Africa, Philistine, afghanistan, Livia and many other countries are not getting the proper medical treatment. So we have open a slogan and a project called people will not suffer for medical treatment

Read More

Healthy Food

In today's world we know that many people do not get their food daily. It is very difficult for us in today's world that people do not get their food. So we opened a project called "No people will die without eating"

Read More

Pure Water

Millions of people around the world live under a lower scale of poverty. They do not get pure, safe and sound drinking water. So we are trying to serve them pure health water for their better future.

Read More

Frequently Asked Questions

Don't hesitate to ask question. If you have any question then ask that question or send us a email or SMS we will answer that query as soon as possible.

Testimonials

People Talk

LoveUs has provided their NGO and Non Profit service approximately 25 years and I see that they provide their service with more trust and honesty. Ohoko Haba Compared to the other NGO in the world I have seen that the service LoveUS provides is safe and their service much better than the other care NGOin the world. Andeaw Meado They are giving their NGO service 24/7. Once I informed them that A man was in trouble. They helped that man within 1 hr and solved that problem and I was impressed. Tomas Nos

item.title: Pandemic fundraising
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Campaigns For
Pandemic

To increase the awareness in people we have to campaign for this pandemic. Otherwise more people will die

Donate Now

You Can Help
The Poor

Your donation can save millions of poor people around the world and make the world a better place.

Donate Now

Donate for
Homeless

Twenty percent people of the world are homeless. So please donate to make happy that they are not homeless.

Donate Now
About Our Mission

Coronavirus Emergency kit Social Distancing to Flatten the Curve

Due to the pandemic we have maintain social distancing and make them awareness who do not know about this more. We have to make sure that every people get the emergency kit.

Donate Now
How To Protect

Covid 19 Prevention Tips

Wash Your Hand

Coronavirus disease (COVID-19) is an infectious disease caused by a newly discovered coronavirus.

Clean & Disinfect

Coronavirus disease (COVID-19) is an infectious disease caused by a newly discovered coronavirus.

Avoid Contact With Sick

Coronavirus disease (COVID-19) is an infectious disease caused by a newly discovered coronavirus.

Pure Water

Millions of people around the world live under a lower scale of poverty. They do not get pure, safe and sound drinking water. So we are trying to serve them pure health water for their better future.

Medical Facilities

People in Africa, Philistine, afghanistan, Livia and many other countries are not getting the proper medical treatment. So we have open a slogan and a project called people will not suffer for medical treatment

Education

Education is the backbone of a nation. But many children do not get a chance to go to school due to their poverty. So we are raising funds for a project called education for everyone and every child will go to school.

Watch Video

Watch Our Latest Activities

We are working on many projects right now such as saving the elephants, making sure of the education for poor children, promoting the rights of poor children and so many other projects.

Donate Now
Our Causes

Popular Causes

Britons infected with coronavirus in France

Wuhan People Has Died From Coronavirus

Help For Covid-19

Our Products

Please Donate For Help

    ANTISEPTIC

    $50.00

    MEDICAL GLOVES

    $10.00

How Can You Help?

Your donation will help us save and improve lives with research, education and emergency care.

Join Us Now Donate Now
Get In Touch

item.title: Directly support individuals
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
You can help an individual person directly that you want to help.

To make sure education for poor children we are raising our funds. At present we are seeing millions of children being neglected around the world. They do not get proper education, food, treatment and many other advantages due to poverty. We are raising our fund to help these poor children around the globe. Your small donation can help us to raise our fund and can make sure of their education, treatment and other things. So please donate to help the poor.

We have launched this project to ensure the rights of poor children.

Around the world many children are neglected due to their poverty. They can eat food properly, and can not go to school. So parents send those children to work for a small amount of money. As a result they are not getting their right. It is shameful for us. So to make sure the rights of poor children who are neglected we are working on this event. Called promoting the rights of poor children.

Raise fund for healthy food

In today's world we know that many people do not get their food daily. It is very difficult for us in today's world that people do not get their food. So we opened a project called "No people will die without eating"

  1.  Food essential for good health and nutrition.
  2. It protects you against many chronic noncommunicable diseases.
  3. Healthy food give us better mood and energy levels
  4. Improved memory and brain health

item.title: Start a fundraiser for yourself
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
You can start a fundraiser and can help the poor who are affected.In today's world due to deforestation wild animals are going to vanish for good. Elephants are one of them.

In today's world due to deforestation wild animals are going to vanish for good. Elephants are one of them. They are also going to vanish from the world. so we want to save those animals who are going to vanish. Not only elephants, we also want to save other animals such as monkeys, tigers, deer and bears to maintain the ecology of the environment. So please donate to us to save the world and wild animals

In today's world we know that many people do not get their food daily. It is very difficult for us in today's world that people do not get their food. So we opened a project called "No people will die without eating"

Called promoting the rights of poor children.

 We are raising our fund to help these poor children around the globe. Your small donation can help us to raise our fund and can make sure of their education, treatment and other things. So please donate to help the poor.
